recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.description: Tender beef simmered with carrots and potatoes.
recipes.ingredients: Beef, carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic, tomato paste, spices
recipes.instructions: Brown beef, add chopped veggies, simmer until soft and flavorful.

recipes.name: Mango juice
recipes.description: Refreshing tropical drink for hot days.
recipes.ingredients: Ripe mangoes, yogurt, honey, ice cubes
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Colorful, crunchy veggies stir-fried in soy sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, soy sauce, garlic, sesame oil
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry veggies on high heat for 5â€“7 mins with sauce.

recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes perfect with syrup or fruit.
recipes.ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder, butter, salt
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients into a batter, cook on a hot pan until golden brown.

recipes.name: Ugali
recipes.instructions: boil water and put unga inside
